short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guten Pass is a password generator (for browsers) using gutenberg texts as source material

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Guten Pass is a simple to use Password Generator with a bit of style. Rather than using a standard common list of English words, Guten Pass allows you to select books from the Gutenberg Library in https://www.gutenberg.org for your choice of words. You may even choose texts written in other languages, like Greek or Chinese.

Source can be found at https://github.com/cmroanirgo/guten-pass

Coming Soon:

- Ability to set styles of passwords and delimeters. eg. "Some/Password" or "AnoTheR_pAssWorD"
- Ability to use an arbitary piece of text as a source
